Finding Securities

Collection of functions for listing basic information on available securities and cryptocurrencies

fmp_list_nyse() fmp_list_nasdaq() fmp_list_amex() fmp_list_tsx() fmp_list_etfs() fmp_list_forex() fmp_list_cryptos() fmp_list_euronext() fmp_list_mutual_funds() fmp_list_commodities() fmp_list_indexes() fmp_list_ciks() fmp_list_stocks()

List Available Securities

fmp_screen_stocks()

Company Stock Screener

Quoting Securities

Collection of functions providing real-time quotes of various securities and cryptocurrencies

fmp_quote()

Retrieve Real-Time Quotes of Selected Securities and Cryptocurrencies

fmp_quote_nyse() fmp_quote_nasdaq() fmp_quote_amex() fmp_quote_tsx() fmp_quote_etfs() fmp_quote_forex() fmp_quote_cryptos() fmp_quote_euronext() fmp_quote_mutual_funds() fmp_quote_commodities() fmp_quote_indexes()

Retrieve Real-Time Quotes of Various Securities and Cryptocurrencies

Company Profile

Company Enterprise Value

fmp_financial_growth()

Company Financial Growth

fmp_key_metrics()

Company Key Metrics

fmp_market_cap()

Company Market Capitalization

fmp_ratios()

Company Financial Ratios

fmp_earnings()

Company Historical Earnings

Collection of functions providing various market information

Most Active Stocks

fmp_market_gainers()

Market Hours and Holidays

Market Sector Performance

fmp_earnings_calendar()

fmp_sec_filings()

API Utilities

Utility functions for connecting to the FMP API

fmp_api_key()

Install a Financial Modeling Prep API Key in Your .Renviron File for Repeated Use
